entry.title: [RBX6][Dedicated Servers] - Rack 46C06
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 23, 23:00 UTC  -  Mar 24, 01:00 UTC

Mar 4, 19:13 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Dedicated Servers offer.

This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 23/03/2025 23:00 UTC
End time : 24/03/2025 01:00 UTC
Service impact : Each server in rack 46C06 will be temporarily unavailable for 15 minutes during the operation.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be migrating servers from rack 46C06 to rack 46C04.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [GRA1][Dedicated Servers] - Rack G118B17 incident notification
entry.content:
Mar 4, 22:30 UTC
Resolved - We would like to inform you that the incident on rack G118B17 has now been resolved.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 04/03/2025 21:16 UTC
End time : 04/03/2025 22:28 UTC
Root Cause : This incident was caused by a network equipment issue.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.

Mar 4, 22:24 UTC
Update - We have new information regarding the incident that affected your service(s).

Please find below an update on the situation:
Update : Vrack network are temporarily unavailable for servers in rack G118B17 since 04/03/2025 22:23 UTC
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

Our teams are fully engaged and working to resolve the issue as quickly as possible. We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Mar 4, 21:53 UTC
Update - We have new information regarding the incident that affected your service(s).

Please find below an update on the situation:
Update : There was an interruption of the Vrack network for the servers in this rack between 04/03/2025 21:16 UTC and 04/03/2025 21:18 UTC.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

Our teams are fully engaged and working to resolve the issue as quickly as possible. We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Mar 4, 21:28 UTC
Identified - We have determined the origin of the incident affecting our Dedicated Servers offer on the specific rack.

Here are some supplementary details :
Start time : 04/03/2025 21:16 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Vrack network are temporarily unavailable for servers in rack G118B17.
Customers Impact : Customers are temporarily unable to access and use their servers in rack G118B17 throught vRack network.
Root Cause : This incident is caused by a network equipment issue.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

Our teams are fully engaged and working to resolve the issue as quickly as possible. We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.
